pointsOfInterest.name: Palacio de Bellas Artes
pointsOfInterest.address: Av. Juárez S/N, Centro Histórico, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: Iconic cultural center with art exhibitions and performances.

pointsOfInterest.name: Zócalo
pointsOfInterest.address: Plaza de la Constitución S/N, Centro Histórico, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: Main square of Mexico City and one of the largest public plazas in the world.

pointsOfInterest.name: Castillo de Chapultepec
pointsOfInterest.address: Bosque de Chapultepec I Secc, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: Historic castle on Chapultepec Hill with panoramic city views.

pointsOfInterest.name: Coyoacán
pointsOfInterest.description: Bohemian neighborhood with colorful buildings and Frida Kahlo Museum.

pointsOfInterest.name: Basílica de Guadalupe
pointsOfInterest.address: Plaza de las Américas 1, Villa de Guadalupe, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: Important Catholic pilgrimage site dedicated to Our Lady of Guadalupe.

pointsOfInterest.name: Xochimilco
pointsOfInterest.description: Famous for its canals and colorful trajineras (boats).

pointsOfInterest.name: Torre Latinoamericana
pointsOfInterest.address: Eje Central Lázaro Cárdenas 2, Centro Histórico, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: Skyscraper with observation deck offering 360° city views.

pointsOfInterest.name: Museo Nacional de Antropología
pointsOfInterest.address: Av. Paseo de la Reforma s/n, Polanco, CDMX
pointsOfInterest.description: World-class museum showcasing Mexico's pre-Columbian heritage.
